message: Actually, it locks automatically, you just need to make sure the door is closed tightly.  Thanks for the kudos, glad you like the new space :)
Just thought I'd share so that none of us have to learn the hard way!
I learned by chance today that, on your way out, you need to hit the long silver button on the fancy schmancy keypad in order to lock the door.
Also, kudos to everyone who helped with the move. The place is great!
Yeah I too learned that the hard way. And I am still unsure of the Open/Close button on the inside.
The open close button opens the lock.  Press it before opening the door and it will unlock it for you.  No need to twist the manual override knob.
